remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`TimerCallback`委托来指定由调用的方法。Use a `TimerCallback` delegate to specify the method that is called by a . 创建计时器; 在线程中，此方法不会执行。它在系统提供一个单独的线程池线程中执行。This method does not execute in the thread that created the timer; it executes in a separate thread pool thread that is provided by the system. `TimerCallback`委托在启动时间结束之后, 将调用一次的方法和每个计时器间隔之前对其进行一次调用将继续调用方法时，或直到方法调用间隔值使用。The `TimerCallback` delegate invokes the method once after the start time elapses, and continues to invoke it once per timer interval until the method is called, or until the method is called with the interval value . > [!NOTE] > 回调可能发生后已调用方法重载，因为计时器队列的线程池线程执行的回调。Callbacks can occur after the method overload has been called, because the timer queues callbacks for execution by thread pool threads. 可以使用方法重载来等待，直到所有回调都已都完成。You can use the method overload to wait until all callbacks have completed. 计时器构造的并且不能更改时，指定计时器委托。The timer delegate is specified when the timer is constructed, and cannot be changed. 开始时间`Timer`传入`dueTime`的参数`Timer`传入构造函数和段`period`参数。The start time for a `Timer` is passed in the `dueTime` parameter of the `Timer` constructors, and the period is passed in the `period` parameter. 有关示例，演示如何创建和使用`TimerCallback`委派，请参阅。For an example that demonstrates creating and using a `TimerCallback` delegate, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与一起使用的委托`Timer`类。The following code example shows how to create the delegate used with the `Timer` class.
